review: нельзя воскресить то что уже мертво

Having dedicated a substantial 3k hours across OW1 and OW2, I cannot  endorse OW2 in any capacity. The game's palpable lack of enjoyment is exacerbated by a pronounced flaw: the lamentable matchmaking. Blizz's alterations have rendered it a bad un-fun experience; matches sway between overpowering victories and devastating losses, with no equilibrium.

Had OW1 been preserved, myself and my friends within the OW community would've remained . Attaining the rank of masters in tank and support roles, my peak coincided with OW1's closure. Presently, the game teeters on the balance of death, and Blizzards endeavor to rejuvenate it via Steam is a lamentably at best.

我倒有不同的看法，韩信这个英雄一直是王者峡谷里面受争议最大的一位英雄。在王者峡谷里流传已久的话语“十个韩信九个坑”，可见玩好韩信的玩家并不多，十个只占九个而已，十分之一的玩家才能玩好他。 韩信的一技能，二技能都有位移，冷却时间短，尤其到了后期，冷却时间也就是两三秒，特别灵活。玩韩信就必须要会带线，带节奏，多把兵线带一带，既能赚金币，又能拆塔，干扰敌人节奏，而且韩信特别灵活，对方没有两人以上基本是抓不到韩信，这样会让对方疲于奔命。 韩信的技能多有控制，在技能与控制的中间靠频a来打输出，前期需要保住自己野区，并且控制敌方野区。韩信拥有俩段位移的超高机动性，让他在进场打完输出并且能够全身而退。韩信在前期要通过打野来进行发育，建议先与辅助和下路去反蓝，然后回家清理自己野区，韩信很依赖蓝buff。中后期多带线，然后去切后排，当你经济压制可以去逼团。

《守望先锋》“归来”：拥有海量的乐色，并且带来了各种新鲜的垃圾。

Overwatch Returns Leaves Players Heartbroken

I don't even know where to begin – Overwatch Returns is an absolute nightmare. I used to be an incredibly devoted fan of this game, but this so-called "return" is making me wish I could throttle the development team.

Firstly, what in the world were they thinking? They completely upended the character abilities, rendering all the previous tactics and strategies worthless. I spent so damn much time mastering each character's skills, and now they've all been changed. It's like they're mocking all my previous efforts. After the update, the game is an absolute mess, and there's no way to enjoy it anymore.

Secondly, the new gameplay mode is like the development team's brains have gone AWOL. They turned team battles into this shameless competitive garbage. This "innovative" mode only intensifies the hostility between players, and there's zero teamwork left. The previously well-defined roles for characters are now reduced to an ego-driven showdown – it's a heartless betrayal of long-time players.

And then there's the game optimization, which is utter crap. Even on a top-tier computer, it lags like hell. What the hell is this? With such frequent updates, can't they spare a thought for optimization? It's like the development team couldn't care less.

In conclusion, Overwatch Returns has left me feeling exceptionally, incredibly, unbelievably, outrageously, overwhelmingly, extraordinarily, deeply, profoundly, extremely, intensely, monumentally, and utterly disappointed. All the enthusiasm I once had has been obliterated by their disastrous decisions time and time again. If the development team doesn't pull themselves together and deliver something remotely decent for the game soon, I'm seriously ditching this ship for good. Consider yourself warned – don't waste any more time on this utterly ruined mess.
